Bind a button to have it add/remove objects from a Hub.

Parameters:
hub - that has active object that is added/removed from hubSelect
hubSelect - the active object from hub will be added/removed from this Hub.

setNullValue

public void setNullValue(java.lang.Object value)
The value to use if the property is null. Useful when using primitive types that might be set to null.

Example:
A boolean property can be true,false or null. Might want to have a null value treated as false.
setNullValue(false);

update

protected void update()
Description copied from class: JFCController
Called to have component update itself. By default, should call updateEnabled, updateVisible Most subclasses will then call update(comp, value) to update component icon/colors/font,etc
